abstract: Shortstops Andrelton Simmons and Didi Gregorius, who play for Atlanta Braves and New York Yankees respectively, first met as five-year-olds on Caribbean island of Curacao; in addition to childhood memories, friends also share same pride-filled journey,  from a small island to world of the major leagues, where they have both established themselves as stellar starting shortstops.
lead_paragraph: When Gregorius and Simmons, shortstops for the Yankees and the Braves who grew up in Curaçao, reunite, old stories are not all that they share.

headline.main: Andrelton Simmons and Didi Gregorius Share Journey: Small Island to Big Leagues
headline.print_headline: Two Shortstops Share Journey: Small Island to Big Leagues

snippet: When Gregorius and Simmons, shortstops for the Yankees and the Braves who grew up in Curaçao, reunite, old stories are not all that they share.
